info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:16PM CDT until June 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR MARION AND NORTHERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 916 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Hackleburg to near Detroit to 6 miles south of Smithville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Winfield, Haleyville, Sulligent, Guin, Hackleburg, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Detroit, Beaverton, Gu- Win, Weston, Blooming Grove, Brinn, Lake Buttahatchee, Crews, Bear Creek, Twin, Tucker and Henson Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
